Interface SCFUtilities

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAvatar(UserProperties userProperties)
      Returns the userProperties avatar URL or InternalSCFUtilities.DEFAULT_AVATAR if profile has no avatar defined.
      java.lang.String getAvatar(UserProperties userProperties, int size)
      Returns the userProperties avatar URL or InternalSCFUtilities.DEFAULT_AVATAR if profile has no avatar defined.
      java.lang.String getAvatar(UserProperties userProperties, java.lang.String absoluteDefaultAvatar)
      Returns the userProperties avatar URL or InternalSCFUtilities.DEFAULT_AVATAR if profile has no avatar defined.
      java.lang.String getAvatar(UserProperties userProperties, java.lang.String absoluteDefaultAvatar, SCFUtilities.AVATAR_SIZE size)
      Returns the userProperties avatar URL or absoluteDefaultAvatar if profile has no avatar defined.
      Page getContainingPage(Resource resource)
      Finds the page which contains the given resource.

    • Method Detail

      • getContainingPage

        Page getContainingPage(Resource resource)
        Finds the page which contains the given resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource for which the page is to be found
        Returns:
        the page that contains the resource

      • getSocialProfileURL

        java.lang.String getSocialProfileURL(java.lang.String username,
                                     ResourceResolver resolver,
                                     Page page)
        Gets the social profile url for a user based on the page being passed in. The form used to show the profile will be the read from "cq:socialProfilePage" in the content hierarchy "above" the page requested.
        Parameters:
        username - user to find the profile for.
        resolver - the resolver to use, which must have read access to the profile other
        page - the page to use as the basis for the search for "cq:socialProfilePage" property.
        Returns:
        a url to the profile or null if the username was not found.

      • getUserProperties

        UserProperties getUserProperties(ResourceResolver resolver,
                                 java.lang.String userId)
        Returns the user properties denoted by the given userId. The user props are looked for using the provided resource resolver, so as to ensure that the user properties are only accessible to users having the necessary access rights on the requested user properties.
        Parameters:
        resolver - The ResourceResolver.
        userId - The user id for which to retrieve the user properties.
        Returns:
        The UserProperties or null if not found.

      • getAvatar

        java.lang.String getAvatar(UserProperties userProperties)
        Returns the userProperties avatar URL or InternalSCFUtilities.DEFAULT_AVATAR if profile has no avatar defined.
        Parameters:
        userProperties - The userProperties (may be null)
        Returns:
        the avatar URL or the default one.

      • getAvatar

        java.lang.String getAvatar(UserProperties userProperties,
                           java.lang.String absoluteDefaultAvatar)
        Returns the userProperties avatar URL or InternalSCFUtilities.DEFAULT_AVATAR if profile has no avatar defined.
        Parameters:
        userProperties - The userProperties (may be null)
        absoluteDefaultAvatar - The absolute default avatar
        Returns:
        the avatar URL or the default one.

      • getAvatar

        java.lang.String getAvatar(UserProperties userProperties,
                           java.lang.String absoluteDefaultAvatar,
                           SCFUtilities.AVATAR_SIZE size)
        Returns the userProperties avatar URL or absoluteDefaultAvatar if profile has no avatar defined.
        Parameters:
        userProperties - The userProperties (may be null)
        absoluteDefaultAvatar - The absolute default avatar
        size - The avatar size (for example, 32)
        Returns:
        the avatar URL or the default one.

      • getAvatar

        java.lang.String getAvatar(UserProperties userProperties,
                           int size)
        Returns the userProperties avatar URL or InternalSCFUtilities.DEFAULT_AVATAR if profile has no avatar defined.
        Parameters:
        userProperties - The userProperties (may be null)
        size - The avatar size (for example, 32)
        Returns:
        the avatar URL or the default one.
